## Welcome to Jasmine Niu's website!

This is Jasmine Niu's personal website for P8105. Jasmine finished most of her formal education in Taiwan, and now she is an MS student in Biostatistics with a concentration in Public Health Data Science at Columbia Mailman School of Public Health.

Click [About](about.html) to see Jasmine's resume. Feel free to contact Jasmine through email and Linkedin via the links on the navigation bar.
